cause.description:
Our niche provides quick, clever, and quality information for reflecting current trends not available in larger published resources.
The Business Quickie is an interactive, niche WEB 2.0 & blog targeted at aspirants of the financial/business world who wish to gain a competitive edge. It provides quick, concise, quality-rich information regarding the latest business trends and insight into special topics. Such insights into the above topics are provided in concise blurbs, blog postings, or “quickies,” without sacrificing the quality and validity of content.
1. Motivate action by young students
2. Inspire Debate
3. Develop an understanding of current trends
cause.mission: create a resource, utility community for industry-specific aspirants
cause.name: The Business Quickie
